intro: Anthemis feinbruniae, commonly known as the Feinbrunia帚菊, is a flowering plant native to the Mediterranean region. It belongs to the Asteraceae family, characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant typically grows in rocky or dry soils, showcasing its adaptability to arid environments. Its yellow flowers are small and daisy-like, often appearing in clusters. Due to its limited distribution and specific habitat requirements, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
